name: Bulk Venison Breakfast Sausage
author: AMYNJOHN36
summary: My husband is a avid hunter and we make this sausage every year.  We add pork to the venison because the venison has such a low fat content.  For the pork we get really fatty looking roast ground at our grocery store.
ingredients: ¼ cup sugar-based curing mixture (such as Morton® Tender Quick®)
directions: In a very large bowl or plastic tub, sprinkle the venison and pork with the curing mixture, pepper, pepper flakes, sugar, and sage
Mix very well to evenly incorporate everything
When working with large quantities of sausage, cook a small piece to make sure the seasoning is exactly how you like it
Divide into 1 pound portions and freeze
